If you know the code comment please.

item.title: [317] Auto Message? NEED CODE
item.dc:creator: @why_so_serious why so serious
item.description:
@why_so_serious wrote:

[quote=“EMINEM BEAST™, post:2, topic:377428”]Find

public void initialize() {

Under that add

mymessage();

add this anywhere

public void mymessage() { EventManager.getSingleton().addEvent( new Event() { public void execute(EventContainer c) { sendMessage("@gre@Hello @whi@" +playerName+ ", @red@ Please Visit our website & Vote For Us"); sendMessage("ADD UR WEBSITE NAME HERE"); } }, 500000); // change the timer if u want };

I don’t take any credit for this, - also I’m guessing your using PI so but if you aren’t I’m sure you can convert it.[/quote]

Im using blurr and there was 5 erroes imma test

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Auto Message? NEED CODE
item.dc:creator: @EMINEM_BEAST EMINEM BEAST™
item.description:
@EMINEM_BEAST wrote:

Find

public void initialize() {

Under that add

mymessage();

add this anywhere

public void mymessage() { EventManager.getSingleton().addEvent( new Event() { public void execute(EventContainer c) { sendMessage("@gre@Hello @whi@" +playerName+ ", @red@ Please Visit our website & Vote For Us"); sendMessage("ADD UR WEBSITE NAME HERE"); } }, 500000); // change the timer if u want };

I don’t take any credit for this, - also I’m guessing your using PI so but if you aren’t I’m sure you can convert it.
